plot outline: Nanda Gokula is a 1972 Indian Kannnada film, directed by Y R Swamy and produced by Vikram Srinivas. The film stars Dr Rajkumar, Jayanthi, Ramesh, K S Ashwath and Balakrishna in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar. Watch the full movie, Nanda Gokula, only on Eros Now.
title: Nanda Gokula
